subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nene scored 20 points and J. R. Smith added all of his 15 in the fourth quarter as the Denver Nuggets ran away to another win, beating the Hawks, 102-87, Wednesday night in Atlanta.
snippet: Nene scored 20 points and J. R. Smith added all of his 15 in the fourth quarter as the Denver Nuggets ran away to another win, beating the Hawks, 102-87, Wednesday night in Atlanta.
